About the Company: Kandagiri Spinning Mills Limited is an India-based company. The Company is engaged in the manufacture and sale of cotton yarn. The Company manufactures carded, combed, auto coned, 100% Spun Polyester Yarn For Sewing Threads (TFO) and ring doubled yarn. The Companys products include single yarn - weaving - cared, combed, knitting - carded, combed, compact yarn, double yarn - ring doubled - carded and gassed yarn - combed. The Companys spinning plants is located at Tamil Nadu. The Companys wind energy plants are located at Panangudi, Pazhavoor, Udhayathoor and Parameshwarapuram.Villages, Radhapuram Taluk, Tirunelveli District, Tamil Nadu.
